items.sentence: It would take me too much time to explain to you why it\'s not going to work.
Is it worth spending time trying to help people who don\'t want to be helped?
It\'s not through inventions but through improvements that fortunes are made.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that I\'ll ever see my stolen motorcycle again.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that we\'ll be able to escape from this prison.
